text: The Overcoat () is a 1959 Soviet drama movie directed by Aleksey Batalov.Фильму «Шинель» 60 лет: 5 интересных фактов со съемок дебютной картины режиссера Алексея БаталоваШИНЕЛЬ (1959) It stars Rolan Bykov, Yuri Tolubeyev, and Aleksandra Yozhkina. The movie is based on Nikolai Gogol's story The Overcoat. ==Actors== * Rolan Bykov - Akaki Akakiyevich * Yuri Tolubeyev - Petrovich * Aleksandra Yozhkina - Petrovich's Wife * Elena Ponsova - Landlady * Georgi Tejkh - Important Person * Nina Urgant - lady of easy virtue * Aleksandr Sokolov - undertaker == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:1959 drama movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Soviet drama movies
title: The Overcoat (1959 movie)
